text: The 2004 Republican National Convention was the 2004 presidential nominating convention. It was for the Republican Party of the United States. George W. Bush and Dick Cheney won the presidential nomination at the convention. It took place from August 30 to September 2, 2004 at Madison Square Garden in New York City. A tribute for Ronald Reagan was shown at the convention. Category:21st century in Manhattan Category:United States presidential nominating conventions Category:Republican Party (United States) Category:2004 in New York City
title: 2004 Republican National Convention
